title: PHPboolval()Function

metadata.description: Learn about PHPboolval()Function with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
Example
content_sections.code:
"; echo "4: " .(boolval(42) ? 'true' : 'false') . "
"; echo '"": ' .(boolval("") ? 'true' : 'false') . "
"; echo '"Hello": ' .(boolval("Hello") ? 'true' : 'false') . "
"; echo '"0": ' .(boolval("0") ? 'true' : 'false') . "
"; echo "[3, 5]: " .(boolval([3, 5]) ? 'true' : 'false') . "
"; echo "[]: " .(boolval([]) ? 'true' : 'false') . "
"; ?>

summary: This tutorial covers PHPboolval()Function concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use PHPboolval()Function effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of PHPboolval()Function and how to apply it in your projects.
